mapper.select: /* com.biz.framework.mapper.MenuMapper.findMenuList */ SELECT MENU_ID , MENU_NM , MENU_SRT_ORD , MENU_UP_ID FROM MENU ORDER BY MENU_UP_ID IS NOT NULL, MENU_SRT_ORD

/* com.biz.framework.mapper.MenuMapper.findSideLayout */ SELECT CASE WHEN MENU_ID LIKE '%PGM%' THEN '3' WHEN MENU_UP_ID IS NOT NULL THEN '2' ELSE '1' END AS CATEGORY , MENU_ID , MENU_UP_ID , URL , MENU_NM , SRT_ORD FROM ( select menu_id , menu_up_id , '' as url , menu_nm , menu_srt_ord as srt_ord from menu m union all select CONCAT('PGM', mp.program_id) as menu_id , mp.menu_id as menu_up_id , program_url as url , program_nm as menu_nm , program_srt_ord as srt_ord from menu_program mp join program p on p.program_id = mp.program_id WHERE P.USE_YN = 'Y' ) AS A ORDER BY CASE WHEN MENU_UP_ID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, SRT_ORD
